## acme-fixer

Check and clean acme.json file.

### Synopsis

Check and clean acme.json file.

```
acme-fixer [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -d, --dry-run        Dry run mode.
  -h, --help           help for acme-fixer
  -i, --input string   The path of the acme.json.
      --v2             Use Traefik v2 format.
```
